We have executed 15+cr Projects in Prefab and Container structures
THE CONTENTS OF THIS DOCUMENT ARE STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL AND NOT TO BE SHARED WITH ANY THIRD
PARTY WITHOUT PRIOR WRITTEN CONSENT OF IXORA.
We have executed 15+cr Projects in Prefab and Container structures

Introducing 
Reflow Toilets
In Collaboration With Leading PartnersDesigned to end open defecation,
uplift streets, communities,
engage employment, prevent
urban waste and change the
narrative around public toilets.
ReFlow Toilets is not only self sustainable, but
leaves almost no waste into the earth

Leaders in People centric Toilet &
Sustainability Design
Patented: Scalable, sustainable, circular economy, cost, deployment - all of it, taken care of
SecurityOn-site owner & trained staff always present
Continuous supervision deters vandalism and misuse
Women safety enhanced significantly with accountability
Sanitation
• IoT-enabled sensors monitor cleanliness & consumables in
real time
 • Scheduled maintenance alerts ensure consistently hygienic
facilities
Accessibility
• Inclusive designs meet ReFlow standards for wheelchair
users and the visually impaired
 • Dedicated “women-only” and LGBTQ+-friendly units
available
Optimized User Flow & Safety
• Separate entry/exit points with clear sightlines to deter
misuse
 • Strategic siting (e.g. next to bike racks, bus stops) maximizes
footfall while maintaining privacyEvery aspect of a public toilet - mastered
Carefully crafted structure that's been built piece
by piece to make greatness

Treatment
System in unit
No extra water
required
Revenue
Generating - Self
sustainable With patents of the
Prefab model.
Circular Economy
System
All waste processed
in house.
Zero Water
releasedAll waste treated on
site, and reused.
Off-gridSelf‐Sustaining, Runs
entirely on-site with
solar power.
Modular &
ScalablePrefabricated units
snap together
seamlessly to expand
capacity as needed.
No sewage
systemTreated on site in the
ReFlow unitKey features of ReFlow Toilets

Introducing - 40 FT. B-CRT Layout 
Any waste water that goes inside comes out ISO30500
Water standard. Treatment - inside the container. Needs
10,000 litres of water to start up, lasts for years without
external requirement. Within one shipping container.

For our inclusive
restrooms, we
have a
multifeature
interior design
Our 
Special 
Interiors
Outdoors
ReFlow plugs into the
urban area reforming
the surroundings, add
green lung spaces to
the surrounding
areas, beautify the
street area and fix the
space. 
Polished, high
quality tiling
proving a
luxurious effect &
durability. Crafted
Fittings
Application of
our inhouse,
parent company
made chemical
products 
Chemicals
usedInside, Outside & what’s consumed

An integration of the world's most advanced toilet technologies
combined with a never seen before sewage treatment system
designed within one 40FT container.The largest scale deployment of the most
advanced public toilet in the worldBLACKWATER-CIRCULAR REINVENTED TOILET
Deploying
2 Quarter of  2025nd

✓ 3 toilet units attached
✓ Customizable fittings & panelling 
✓ Integrated advanced technologyReFlow Standard
ReFlow Possibilities
Imagine a place. Where communites are built, sanitation is thriving & resources are recycled
✓ Cost-effective modular design 
✓ Ground-level accessibility for all user groups
✓ Strong visual presence with branded aestheticReflow Large Reflow Hub
✓ Combined Mobility + Sanitation + Food
Service Model for maximum utility
✓ Advanced treatment systems 
✓ Flagship ReFlow Units

Reflow Tech
Empowering hygiene
and accessibility with
cutting-edge
technology. 
Seamlessly locate,
access, and experience
free, sustainable public
restrooms designed for
modern urban needs.
From real-time
navigation to smart
maintenance features,
the LooCafe app ensures
safety, cleanliness, and
convenience at your
fingertips.“Revolutionizing
Public Sanitation
with the ReFlow App”

Sanitary: The technology ecosystem, combined
with the Point of Sale (PoS) system and Facility
Management (FM) team, emphasizes
maintenance.
Accessible: 3 public toilet facilities, with one
inclusive restroom, added on ramps and
customizations are available.Infocus: A Standard ReFlow Unit
Prefabricated Built on a BoT basis,
making relocation & installation easy
with minimal construction & easy repair. 
Courteous Build Toilets towards the back &
structural reinforcement between PoS & toilets,
carefully structured for positive perception
demographic wiseToilet Tech © Stink Sensors, management
tech, toilet location, AI operations & inventory
management all in one app.
Sustainable Water waste
management tech - waterloop & waste
management systems ongrid/offgrid

External
Users 
Integrate AI into unit
status trackingUpgradeable IoT
Track Usage
Maintenance
Visits
Locate units
Daily images onto a single screen
- worldwide
Understand everything there is with a
particular unit.
Hold the right stakeholders
accountable.
Know when units open, close, perform.
Cleanliness score.
Unit visit records historically tracked for
years.

Through Design, Innovation,
and Inspiration.
Thank You

Scalable Decentralized
Sanitation Infrastructure
Smart, resilient, and sustainable public toilet
solutions designed for modern urban needs

50 Locations for Reflow
Toilets Compliant with
Gazette CG DL-E-08102024-
257748
These locations adhere to
the Liquid Waste
Management Rules 2024, as
specified in the Gazette
dated October 8, 2024.Gazzette CG DL-E- 08102024-257748 
Dated: 7 October 2024th

ReFlow unitKey features of ReFlow Toilets

ReFlow Possibilities
✓  Compact Structure: An 8x8 ft unit with two
side-attached toilets for cost-effectiveness
✓ Grassroot level distribution for public toiletsImagine a place. Where communites are built, sanitation is thriving & resources are recycled
ReFlow Mini

✓ 6 Cubicles

footfall while maintaining privacyEvery aspect of a public toilet - mastered
Carefully crafted structure that's been built piece
by piece to make greatness

The ReFlow Partner
ReFlow collects a partnership fee
from the person running the PoS at
the unit. This is a mutual partnership
fee depending on the needs of the
consumer. 
Advertisement Panels
All 4 sides, and walls inwards,
have advertisement spaces
available. Legal, commercially
available spaces with data for
advertisers.
Tech & Community
With our patented Facility
management toilet tech, we go
beyond our units, we can not other
structures and also monetize
through our digital community
One unit. Multiple
Sustainability StreamsThe Primary Innovation
Is the sustainability model

pages.text:
To
                                                                                                               
Date:
 
7th
 
May
 
2025
 
Shri
 
Jayesh
 
Ranjan,
 
IAS
 
Special
 
Chief
 
Secretary
 
to
 
Government
 
of
 
Telangana
 
CEO
 
–
 
Industry
 
&
 
Investment
 
Cell,
 
CMO
 
&
 
SPEED
 
Government
 
of
 
Telangana
 
Hyderabad
 
Subject:
 
Technical
 
Specifications
 
of
 
Reflow
 
B-CRT
 
System
 
and
 
Request
 
for
 
Manufacturing
 
Facility
 
Land
 
Allocation
 
in
 
Telangana
 
Respected
 
Sir,
 
Following
 
our
 
previous
 
communication
 
regarding
 
the
 
Community
 
Reinvented
 
Toilet
 
(CRT)
 
partnership
 
with
 
the
 
Bill
 
&
 
Melinda
 
Gates
 
Foundation,
 
I
 
am
 
pleased
 
to
 
present
 
the
 
technical
 
capabilities
 
of
 
the
 
B-CRT
 
(Blackwater
 
Circular
 
Reinvented
 
Toilet)
 
system
 
being
 
deployed
 
in
 
Hyderabad.
 
This
 
report
 
outlines
 
the
 
engineering
 
specifications
 
that
 
make
 
this
 
technology
 
an
 
ideal
 
candidate
 
for
 
local
 
manufacturing
 
in
 
Telangana.
 
B-CRT
 
Technical
 
Architecture:
 
Engineering
 
Overview
 
The
 
B-CRT
 
represents
 
the
 
most
 
advanced
 
implementation
 
of
 
the
 
Gates
 
Foundation's
 
"Reinvent
 
the
 
Toilet"
 
initiative
 
globally.
 
Housed
 
in
 
a
 
40-foot
 
container
 
(with
 
20-foot
 
variant
 
available
 
for
 
space-constrained
 
areas),
 
each
 
unit
 
features:
 
-
 
6
 
individual
 
toilet
 
cubicles
 
serving
 
300+
 
users
 
daily
 
-
 
9
 
solar
 
panels
 
(450W
 
each)
 
providing
 
4.05kWp
 
capacity
 
-
 
6
 
battery
 
systems
 
delivering
 
20kWh
 
storage
 
for
 
72+
 
hours
 
of
 
off-grid
 
operation
 
-
 
8-stage
 
treatment
 
process
 
yielding
 
ISO30500
 
standard
 
water
 
quality
 
-
 
IoT
 
control
 
system
 
with
 
35+
 
monitoring
 
points
 
and
 
remote
 
management
 
capabilities
 
Core
 
Technology
 
Systems
 
1.
 
Water
 
Treatment
 
&
 
Recycling
 
System
 
-
 
Complete
 
8-stage
 
treatment
 
process:
 
●
 
Pre-treatment
 
with
 
2mm
 
screening
 
and
 
solids
 
separation
 
●
 
Primary
 
anaerobic
 
digestion
 
in
 
2,000L
 
bioreactor
 
●
 
Secondary
 
aerobic
 
treatment
 
with
 
fine-bubble
 
diffusion
 
●
 
Membrane
 
filtration
 
with
 
0.04
 
micron
 
ultrafiltration
 
●
 
Advanced
 
oxidation
 
with
 
UV-C
 
(254nm
 
wavelength)
 
●
 
Activated
 
carbon
 
filtration
 
for
 
trace
 
contaminants
 
●
 
Mineralization
 
and
 
pH
 
stabilization
 
to
 
6.8-7.2
 
●
 
Final
 
disinfection
 
with
 
real-time
 
quality
 
monitoring
 
-
 
Water
 
self-sufficiency
 
metrics:
 
●
 
Initial
 
charge:
 
10,000
 
liters
 
during
 
commissioning
 
●
 
Water
 
recovery:
 
95-98%
 
efficiency
 
throughout
 
treatment

●
 
Daily
 
processing
 
capacity:
 
2,000-3,000L
 
of
 
wastewater
 
●
 
Annual
 
water
 
savings:
 
420,000-600,000
 
liters
 
per
 
unit
 
2.
 
Energy
 
System
 
Architecture
 
-
 
Solar
 
generation:
 
4.05kWp
 
capacity
 
with
 
maximum
 
daily
 
yield
 
of
 
16-20kWh
 
-
 
Storage
 
capacity:
 
20kWh
 
lithium
 
iron
 
phosphate
 
batteries
 
-
 
Consumption:
 
12-15kWh
 
daily
 
under
 
normal
 
operating
 
conditions
 
-
 
Grid
 
connection:
 
Automatic
 
switchover
 
capability
 
for
 
critical
 
systems
 
-
 
Load
 
management:
 
Prioritization
 
algorithms
 
for
 
critical
 
functions
 
3.
 
Waste
 
Management
 
Technology
 
-
 
Sludge
 
reduction:
 
>90%
 
volume
 
reduction
 
compared
 
to
 
conventional
 
systems
 
-
 
Treatment
 
process:
 
Enzymatic
 
pre-treatment
 
with
 
thermal
 
disinfection
 
(70°C)
 
-
 
End
 
product:
 
Class
 
A
 
Biosolids
 
per
 
EPA
 
standards
 
-
 
Maintenance
 
cycle:
 
Extraction
 
required
 
only
 
once
 
every
 
9-12
 
months
 
-
 
Zero
 
discharge:
 
Complete
 
elimination
 
of
 
sewage
 
system
 
dependencies
 
4.
 
Digital
 
Intelligence
 
System
 
-
 
Central
 
processing
 
unit:
 
Industrial-grade
 
edge
 
computing
 
with
 
redundant
 
storage
 
-
 
Connectivity:
 
Multi-redundant
 
4G/LTE
 
with
 
LoRaWAN
 
backup
 
-
 
Analytics
 
platform:
 
Three-tiered
 
dashboard
 
system
 
for:
 
●
 
Area
 
executives:
 
City-wide
 
monitoring
 
and
 
KPI
 
tracking
 
●
 
Operations

(CRT)

&
 
Melinda
 
Gates

I

to

the

of

B-CRT
 
(Blackwater
 
Circular
 
Reinvented
 
Toilet)
 
system

deployed
 
in

report

that
 
make
 
this

an

candidate
 
for

in

B-CRT
 
Technical
 
Architecture:
 
Engineering
 
Overview
 
The
 
B-CRT
 
represents
 
the
 
most
 
advanced
 
implementation
 
of
 
the
 
Gates
 
Foundation's
 
"Reinvent
 
the
 
Toilet"
 
initiative
 
globally.
 
Housed
 
in
 
a
 
40-foot
 
container
 
(with
 
20-foot
 
variant
 
available
 
for
 
space-constrained
 
areas),
 
each
 
unit
 
features:
 
-
 
6
 
individual
 
toilet
 
cubicles
 
serving
 
300+
 
users
 
daily
 
-
 
9
 
solar
 
panels
 
(450W
 
each)
 
providing
 
4.05kWp
 
capacity
 
-
 
6
 
battery
 
systems
 
delivering
 
20kWh
 
storage
 
for
 
72+
 
hours
 
of
 
off-grid
 
operation
 
-
 
8-stage
 
treatment
 
process
 
yielding
 
ISO30500
 
standard
 
water
 
quality

control

monitoring

and

management

&

Eco-san company and product introduction.file: Eco-san company and product introduction_CRT&HRT version (1).pptx

slides.text:
Eco-san company and product introduction
Yixing Eco-sanitary Manufacture Co., Ltd.
November 2024

Yixing Eco-san develops related technologies of "ecological toilets, low-carbon toilets, and zero-carbon toilets" based on the concept of "green, ecological, and environmental protection"
Dedicated to becoming a leading enterprise in ecological toilet technology
The technological Eco-san
Companyintroduction

Yixing is located in the most economically developed region in eastern China. It is a regional transportation hub in the Yangtze River Delta and is about 200km away from Shanghai.
Yixing's Geographical Location

Yixing Eco-sanitary Manufacture Co., Ltd. (Eco-san for short) is a R&D and manufacturing enterprise dedicated to providing high-standard and high-quality ecological toilets.
Factory appearance
Workshop interior
Company overview

The company introduced the water recycling and reuse eco-toilet technology from the team of Professor Hoffmann of the California Institute of Technology (foreign academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering) who won the first prize in the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation‘s global “Toilet Challenge” in 2011, and received Mr. Gate’s recognition.
Company Overview

California Institute of Technology
Professor Hoffmann's team won the only "first prize"
Company and product characteristics

The world's first company to test the international standard ISO30500 for non-sewered toilets, which is tested by Germany's TUV SUD.
ISO30500 test site
Company overview

Yixing Eco-sanitary Manufacture Co., Ltd. is a leading enterprise in ecological toilet technology and a cooperative unit of the Chinese Academy of Engineering's "Toilet Revolution Project".
Academician Li Xiaohong, President of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, led a team to inspect Eco-san
Jiangsu Provincial Party Committee Secretary Lou Qinjian inspected Eco-san
Company overview

The company has a highly specialized and international technology research and development, product manufacturing, and operation management team. Its ultimate pursuit of product quality, details, and customer needs has established its position as the second to none leading enterprise in domestic ecological toilets.
Company overview
Product section

Eco-san products
Household toilet product——b-HRT

（1）Public toilet product
Also known as blackwater-Community Reinvented Toilet (hereinafter referred to as b-CRT), it is mainly used in public places, including front-end toilet and back-end black water treatment system. There are mainly two categories: mobile and fixed types.

（2）Household toilet product
Also known as blackwater-Household Reinvented Toilet (hereinafter referred to as b-HRT), it is mainly used for the back-end treatment of black water in household toilets, and can also be applied to the back-end black water treatment of public toilets used by a small number of people.


Product Overview

Product effluent standard
The effluent of both public toilet product and household toilet product meet the following standards:
① Meet ISO30500-2018 standard
② Meet the standard of "Urban Wastewater Recycling and Urban Miscellaneous Water Quality" (GB/T18920-2020)
Urban Wastewater Recycling and Urban Miscellaneous Water Quality" (GB/T18920-2020)

Process flow

Container integrated type
Buried underground split type
Public toilet product——b-CRT

Case study
Treatment system scale: 200 flushes/day
Application location: Fangshan · Beijing
Application location: Xicheng · Beijing
Application location: Dongcheng · Beijing
Application location: Yixing · Jiangsu
Public toilet product——b-CRT

Note: The data in the above table is taken from the average value of the test water sample.
Water quality index before and after black water treatment
Operation effect (taking Fangshan as an example)
Public toilet product——b-CRT

Place of use
Mainly used to treat toilet black water or domestic gray water from farmers, homestays, suburban villas, etc. that cannot connect to the sewer network.
The treatment capacity of toilet black water is 100L/day (the treatment capacity of this system for treating domestic gray water is 200L/day).
Schematic diagram of b-HRT usage location

Up to standard discharge

Recycling
Household toilet product——b-HRT

Process flow
Biological purification tank: AOAO process is adopted, and sewage is treated anaerobic and aerobic in the biological purification tank. Under anaerobic conditions, large molecules decompose into easily decomposable small molecules; Through aerobic treatment, organic matter in the sewage layer is continuously adsorbed and oxidized by microorganisms, resulting in a decrease in index of pollutants such as ammonia nitrogen and COD in the water.
The concept of "returning to nature with the power of nature"
Advanced treatment tank: Utilizing the purification ability and filtration effect of advanced treatment filler materials to further degrade organic matter and filter SS, achieving the effects of phosphorus removal, deodorization, and decolorization.
Disinfection and Sterilization (ECR): There are two types of disinfection and sterilization methods that can be selected based on the on-site usage situation:
①UV - General application: The radiation ability of ultraviolet radiation can destroy the DNA molecular structure of microorganisms such as bacteria, viruses, fungi, etc., causing them to lose their reproductive and growth abilities, thereby achieving the purpose of sterilization.
② ECR - When the microbial biomass is very high (up to 1*1010cfu/mL): ECR must be used to produce strong oxidants such as · OH and HOCl/ClO - through electrolysis, which can convert organic pollutants in sewage into CO2, convert ammonia nitrogen into nitrogen, and kill various bacteria and viruses.

Household toilet product——b-HRT

产品介绍




Biological purificaiton tank
Advanced treatment tank
Disinfection and sterilization
Sectional view
Physical diagram
Household toilet product——b-HRT
Standard water treatment module
Water quality index before and after black water treatment

Convenient to move
Quick assembly
Beautiful and durable

Flexible selection
UV/ECR disinfection and sterilization: different types can be selected according to on-site usage conditions
Standard water treatment module
Household toilet product——b-HRT

When treating a large amount of water, module combinations are used
Product Multi-module Combination Usage Table
Household toilet product——b-HRT

Specification parameters (single module)
Household toilet product——b-HRT
Product Single Module Specification Parameter Table

1500mmL
1050mmW



Natural ecology, good treatment effect
The treatment process combining biological purification and advanced treatment can not only treat COD and SS, but also remove the color and odor of sewage, and finally realize the recycling of water.



High degree of automation
The equipment system adopts automatic control, and manual operation is reserved, and the appropriate operation mode can be freely selected according to needs.



Modular design, good mobility
The on-site installation is fast, the whole system is small in size and easy to move, and the modular design of the system makes the equipment have a wide range of applicability.



Simple maintenance and low operating costs
The whole system has no complicated professional equipment, low failure rate, simple maintenance, low power consumption of equipment, and compared with other treatment processes, the operating cost is greatly reduced.
Household toilet product——b-HRT 
process characteristics

Location: 
Yixing He Hua Geng
Location: 
Eco-san
Case study
Household toilet product——b-HRT

Case study
Customized version
Customized for Canadian customers
Household toilet product——b-HRT

Operational effect
The effluent water quality meets the reuse standard of ISO30500-2018, and the test data is as follows:
Household toilet product——b-HRT
Water quality index before and after black water treatment

Site application conditions (single module)
Household toilet product——b-HRT
Table of Site Application Conditions for Single Module Products

产品介

b-CRT and b-HRT product electronic control operation management multi-terminal access to the site
Product Management Platform
To ensure the normal operation of the system and timely detection and resolution of problems, Eco-san has established a product management platform, which mainly plays the following roles:
▶Fault detection, early warning, and feedback       ▶Accumulate equipment operation experience
▶Visual display                            ▶Improve the operational efficiency and reliability of equipment
（Detailed information can be found in another document）

Sludge harmless treatment equipment (accessory)


Electrocatalysis generates substances such as free radicals and residual chlorine etc. to invade the interior of bacteria, using chlorination properties to destroy proteases in bacteria and kill harmful bacteria such as Escherichia coli.
Using the thermal energy of electric heating device to destroy the external structure of parasite eggs, causing the parasite to die.
Sludge harmless treatment equipment

Physical diagram of 
sludge harmless treatment equipment
Sludge harmless treatment equipment (accessory)

Product section

Eco-san products
Household toilet product——b-HRT

--- Slide 13 ---

（1）Public toilet product
Also known as blackwater-Community Reinvented Toilet (hereinafter referred to as b-CRT), it is mainly used in public places, including front-end toilet and back-end black water treatment system. There are mainly two categories: mobile and fixed types.

（2）Household toilet product
Also known as blackwater-Household Reinvented Toilet (hereinafter referred to as b-HRT), it is mainly used for the back-end treatment of black water in household toilets, and can also be applied to the back-end black water treatment of public toilets used by a small number of people.


Product Overview

--- Slide 14 ---




Product effluent standard
The effluent of both public toilet product and household toilet product meet the following standards:
① Meet ISO30500-2018 standard
② Meet the standard of "Urban Wastewater Recycling and Urban Miscellaneous Water Quality" (GB/T18920-2020)
Urban Wastewater Recycling and Urban Miscellaneous Water Quality" (GB/T18920-2020)

--- Slide 18 ---


Place of use
Mainly used to treat toilet black water or domestic gray water from farmers, homestays, suburban villas, etc. that cannot connect to the sewer network.
The treatment capacity of toilet black water is 100L/day (the treatment capacity of this system for treating domestic gray water is 200L/day).
Schematic diagram of b-HRT usage location

Up to standard discharge

Recycling
Household toilet product——b-HRT

--- Slide 19 ---


Process flow
Biological purification tank: AOAO process is adopted, and sewage is treated anaerobic and aerobic in the biological purification tank. Under anaerobic conditions, large molecules decompose into easily decomposable small molecules; Through aerobic treatment, organic matter in the sewage layer is continuously adsorbed and oxidized by microorganisms, resulting in a decrease in index of pollutants such as ammonia nitrogen and COD in the water.
The concept of "returning to nature with the power of nature"
Advanced treatment tank: Utilizing the purification ability and filtration effect of advanced treatment filler materials to further degrade organic matter and filter SS, achieving the effects of phosphorus removal, deodorization, and decolorization.
Disinfection and Sterilization (ECR): There are two types of disinfection and sterilization methods that can be selected based on the on-site usage situation:
①UV - General application: The radiation ability of ultraviolet radiation can destroy the DNA molecular structure of microorganisms such as bacteria, viruses, fungi, etc., causing them to lose their reproductive and growth abilities, thereby achieving the purpose of sterilization.
② ECR - When the microbial biomass is very high (up to 1*1010cfu/mL): ECR must be used to produce strong oxidants such as · OH and HOCl/ClO - through electrolysis, which can convert organic pollutants in sewage into CO2, convert ammonia nitrogen into nitrogen, and kill various bacteria and viruses.

Household toilet product——b-HRT

Natural ecology, good treatment effect
The treatment process combining biological purification and advanced treatment can not only treat COD and SS, but also remove the color and odor of sewage, and finally realize the recycling of water.



High degree of automation
The equipment system adopts automatic control, and manual operation is reserved, and the appropriate operation mode can be freely selected according to needs.



Modular design, good mobility
The on-site installation is fast, the whole system is small in size and easy to move, and the modular design of the system makes the equipment have a wide range of applicability.



Simple maintenance and low operating costs
The whole system has no complicated professional equipment, low failure rate, simple maintenance, low power consumption of equipment, and compared with other treatment processes, the operating cost is greatly reduced.

--- Slide 30 ---

Sludge harmless treatment equipment (accessory)


Electrocatalysis generates substances such as free radicals and residual chlorine etc. to invade the interior of bacteria, using chlorination properties to destroy proteases in bacteria and kill harmful bacteria such as Escherichia coli.
Using the thermal energy of electric heating device to destroy the external structure of parasite eggs, causing the parasite to die.
